common_questions.what_is_dscr: DSCR (Debt Service Coverage Ratio) loans qualify borrowers based on the property's rental income divided by the mortgage payment. A ratio of 1.0 or higher typically qualifies.
common_questions.who_qualifies: Real estate investors with 620+ credit score and investment properties generating positive cash flow. No personal income verification needed.
common_questions.rates_and_terms: DSCR rates start at 5.99% with 30-year fixed options. 85% LTV available on purchases, 80% on refinances.
common_questions.application_process: Simple online application at capitalbridgesolutions.com. Get pre-approved in 24-48 hours, close in 2-3 weeks.
common_questions.geographic_coverage: Nationwide lending across all 50 US states with focus on California, Texas, Florida, Arizona, and Nevada.
